summary: Northern Europe is the northern part of the European continent.
full_text: Northern Europe is the northern part or region of Europe. Geographically, northern Europe consists of : Iceland, Ireland, Great Britain, Scandinavia, Northern Germany, Finland, the Baltic States and Northwest Russia. Greenland, a constituent country of Kingdom of Denmark, geographically a part of North America, is politically a part of the Northern Europe because of its strong historic ties to the European mainland, and may be included depending on the context.
title: Northern Europe
